data.name: Preset Message 2
data.message: “Look at those fools. They have no appreciation for art. You have to feel art. And true art... is an EXPLOSION!”

data.name: Preset Message 3
data.message: “Cower in awe! Cry your heart out! Because my art ... is an EXPLOSION!”

data.name: Preset Message 4
data.message: “Fine art is the beauty of that single fleeting moment of explosion.”

data.name: Preset Message 5
data.message: “Even a Buddha loses patience when insulted a third time… One more word and there'll be no doubt about the cause of your death.”
